mapper.select: SELECT c.title, b.good_status, c.price, b.post_fee, b.logistics_name, b.logistics_code, b.deliver_time, b.evaluate_status FROM tb_order a JOIN tb_order_detail b ON a.id = b.tb_order_id JOIN tb_sku c ON b.sku_id = c.id WHERE a.openId = #{openId}
select * from tb_order a where a.order_id=#{openId} and a.order_status=#{orderStatus}
select * from tb_sku a where a.id=#{skuId}
